headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body:
This pull request adds input-based compaction to OpenAIResponsesCompactionSession, including an auto mode that switches to input when responses arenâ€™t stored, and threads store settings into compaction calls so store=false works without previous_response_id. It extends compaction args/types, updates runner behavior to pass store information, and adds tests to cover input/auto/store=false cases. It also adds a stateless compaction example and updates the non-stateless example to show auto-compacted state, then manual compaction, and the final session items.

This pull request resolves https://github.com/openai/openai-agents-python/issues/2333
issueOrPullRequest.title: feat: #2333 support input-based responses compaction with store-aware auto mode
